Class HttpPosterPipeline

java.lang.Object
ca.gc.cra.radar.infrastructure.poster.HttpPosterPipeline
All Implemented Interfaces:
PosterPipeline
public final class HttpPosterPipeline extends Object implements PosterPipeline
File-based poster pipeline for HTTP message pairs.

Delegates rendering to SegmentPosterProcessor and requires file input/output paths.

Since:
RADAR 0.1-doc

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    HttpPosterPipeline()
    Creates a pipeline using the default SegmentPosterProcessor.
    HttpPosterPipeline(ca.gc.cra.radar.infrastructure.poster.SegmentPosterProcessor processor)
    Creates a pipeline with a custom processor (primarily for tests).

    • process

      public void process(PosterConfig.ProtocolConfig config, PosterConfig.DecodeMode decodeMode, PosterOutputPort outputPort) throws Exception
      Renders HTTP pairs from the configured input directory into the output directory.
      Specified by:
      process in interface PosterPipeline
      Parameters:
      config - per-protocol configuration (file paths required)
      decodeMode - decode mode controlling payload processing
      outputPort - ignored (HTTP file pipeline writes via SegmentPosterProcessor)
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if config is null
      Exception - if reading or rendering fails
      Since:
      RADAR 0.1-doc
      Implementation Note:
      Operates on filesystem inputs/outputs; outputPort is unused.
